I had never played any of the half life games before, all I knew is that Gordon Freeman was the main protagonist. I absolutely loved this game. The game still looks really good for its age, and the game play especially makes up for the lack of cutting edge graphics. The weapons are well balanced, and combat is a lot of fun. There are a lot of moments the game allows for you to use your environment against the Combine. i.e. explosive barrels, saw blades, or just heavy objects in general. The gravity gun allows for really unique game play when it comes to the physics engine. The variety of weapons is something I loved as you must use certain weapons in unique situations. The story was also superb. Playing as a silent protagonist allows you to play Gordon the way you want to play him, and allows you to fully absorb the story. From escaping City 17 to raiding Nova Prospekt was a huge variation in game play. The final act when your gravity gun gets supercharged is arguably one of my favorite ending sequences to any video game. All in all, Valve made a stellar game, and now I understand the love and appreciation for this immaculate series. Good on you Valve. Good on you.

After finishing this game, I'm positive it's in my top 10 favorites. The music is amazing, the environment and storytelling are fantastic, and the physics are just mind boggling especially for the time it was released. I can't think of any recent games that were as innovative or inventive as this and for that I say you are doing yourself a disservice by not getting this game.

Bonjour à tous, aujourd’hui on se retrouve pour la review de [u][b]Half Life 2[/b][/u]

[h1]C’est quoi Half Life 2 ?[/h1]
Half Life 2 est un jeu de type fps aventure en solo sorti vers fin 2004 et développé par Valve. Ce jeu va vous faire vivre l’aventure de Gordon Freeman quelques années après le désastre de Black Mesa. Combattez dans un monde gouverné par une milice et des monstres échappés de Black Mesa.

[h1]Ce que j’aime[/h1]
[i]-Un chef d’œuvre de Valve comme tout les Half Life
-Une aventure palpitante
-De multiples environnements variés
-Des véhicules zebi
-Des énigmes sympathiques
-De la bonne VF pour un jeu de 2004
-Une histoire incroyable[/i]

[h1]Ce que j’aime moins[/h1]
[i]-Certains ennemis increvables après 10k chargeurs
-Des alliés IA plutôt débiles
-Les chargements en cour de jeu qui cassent l’immersion[/i]

Bref, c’était ma review sur Half Life 2 et on se donne rendez vous pour la review d’un autre jeu. BYE !!

Muhteşemdi. Kötü eleştirecek bir yön bulamıyorum, hala ben gibi Half-Life serilerini oynamadıysanız, oynamanızı; hele ki 2'yi şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum. 1'e göre daha iç açıcı ve daha güzel bir oynanış sunuyor, zamanları farklı fakat 1'i çok seven oyuncu arkadaşlarımız da var. Gayet süperdi, 3'ü sabırsızlıkla :DD bekliyoruz. Kaç yıl olmuş amk ne sabırı der dediğinizi duyar gibiyim, evet...
